div.p: 0.9.10 changes the mechanism for doing LeaseSet lookups, making it more difficult for an attacker to correlate a Destination with a Router. It also fixes character encoding bugs in susimail, and includes lots of other bug fixes and translation updates. Most of you will update via torrent, using the new "su3" update format using stronger keys. We recommend that all users update.
We recently attended 30C3 and Real World Crypto, making several new connections and fornmulating big plans for 2014. Thanks to those who supported our attendance with their donations!
